name: Daily Card
description: Quick daily guidance, focus, or theme for the day ahead.

positions.name: The Day's Focus
positions.description: This card represents the energy and guidance for your day.

name: Past - Present - Future
description: Three-card spread for timeline insight and flow of events.

positions.name: Past
positions.description: Events and influences from your past that affect the current situation.

positions.name: Present
positions.description: Your current situation and the energies surrounding you now.

positions.name: Future
positions.description: Potential outcome and where things are heading.

name: Situation - Action - Outcome
description: A quick problem-solving spread for clear advice on a specific issue.

positions.name: The Situation
positions.description: The current state of the issue you are inquiring about.

positions.name: The Action
positions.description: The course of action or attitude you should adopt.

positions.name: The Outcome
positions.description: The likely outcome if you follow the suggested action.

name: The Four Elements
description: A spread for holistic insight by dividing the situation into energetic components (Earth, Air, Fire, Water).

positions.name: Earth (Material Reality)
positions.description: The practical and financial aspects of the situation.

positions.name: Air (Mental State)
positions.description: Your thoughts, clarity, and communication surrounding the issue.

positions.name: Fire (Action & Passion)
positions.description: The energy, drive, and motivation involved.

positions.name: Water (Emotions & Intuition)
positions.description: The feelings, intuition, and emotional currents at play.

name: Deeper Insights
description: Five-card spread for comprehensive guidance on a life path.

positions.name: Present Situation
positions.description: What is happening in your life right now.

positions.name: Challenge
positions.description: The obstacle or challenge you're facing.

positions.name: Past Influence
positions.description: Past events influencing the current situation.

positions.name: Future Influence
positions.description: What is approaching or developing.

positions.name: Outcome
positions.description: The potential outcome based on current path.

name: Relationship Dynamics
description: Analysis of the relationship between two people, be it romantic or professional.

positions.name: Person A's Feelings
positions.description: How Person A (you or your partner) feels about the relationship.

positions.name: Person B's Feelings
positions.description: How Person B feels about the relationship.

positions.name: The Bond
positions.description: The core energy and current state of the relationship itself.

positions.name: External Challenge
positions.description: External factors or challenges affecting the relationship.

positions.name: Potential Outcome
positions.description: Where the relationship is likely heading.

name: The Choice (Path A vs. Path B)
description: A spread to explore two potential futures based on a critical decision.

positions.name: The Root Issue
positions.description: The main concern or decision you are facing.

positions.name: Path A - Action
positions.description: The energy or action required if you choose Path A.

positions.name: Path B - Action
positions.description: The energy or action required if you choose Path B.

positions.name: Path A - Outcome
positions.description: The likely short-term outcome of choosing Path A.

positions.name: Path B - Outcome
positions.description: The likely short-term outcome of choosing Path B.

positions.name: Best Advice
positions.description: Advice on which path aligns better with your higher purpose.

name: Goal Reaching Spread
description: Focuses on identifying obstacles and resources needed to achieve a specific goal.

positions.name: The Goal
positions.description: Your clear intention for the goal.

positions.name: Inner Resource
positions.description: Your internal strength to help you succeed.

positions.name: Outer Resource
positions.description: External help or advantage available to you.

positions.name: Internal Obstacle
positions.description: Mental blocks or self-sabotaging behavior.

positions.name: External Obstacle
positions.description: People or circumstances that may hinder you.

positions.name: Action Step
positions.description: The most important next step to take.

positions.name: Likely Result
positions.description: The ultimate outcome if you follow the guidance.

name: Shadow Self Work
description: A spread for introspection, revealing hidden aspects of the self and healing past wounds.

positions.name: Ego's View
positions.description: How you consciously perceive the situation.

positions.name: The Shadow's Manifestation
positions.description: How the shadow self is expressing itself currently.

positions.name: Root of the Shadow
positions.description: The core past event or wound that created this shadow.

positions.name: What Needs Light
positions.description: The quality or truth you need to acknowledge and integrate.

positions.name: Action for Healing
positions.description: A step to take to confront and heal the shadow.

positions.name: Hidden Gift
positions.description: The positive potential contained within the shadow.

positions.name: Lesson Learned
positions.description: The wisdom gained from integrating this part of yourself.

positions.name: Future Self
positions.description: How you will feel once this shadow work is complete.

name: Celtic Cross
description: A comprehensive spread for deep analysis of any issue, exploring past, present, future, external influences, and hopes/fears.

positions.name: The Present
positions.description: The immediate energy of the situation.

positions.name: The Challenge
positions.description: What crosses or opposes the present situation.

positions.name: The Root
positions.description: The subconscious foundation or origin of the issue.

positions.name: Recent Past
positions.description: Events and influences receding from the past.

positions.name: Potential Outcome
positions.description: The highest potential the situation can reach.

positions.name: Immediate Future
positions.description: What is immediately approaching.

positions.name: The Querent (Self)
positions.description: Your attitude, perspective, or role in the situation.

positions.name: External Influence
positions.description: How others perceive you or factors outside your control.

positions.name: Hopes & Fears
positions.description: Your internal hopes or secret anxieties.

positions.name: The Final Outcome
positions.description: The long-term result or destiny of the query.

name: Career Advancement Spread
description: Analyzes the path to a promotion or new job, focusing on personal strengths and required changes.

positions.name: Current Job Status (Row 1)
positions.description: The foundation and current reality of your career.

positions.name: Your Core Skill (Row 1)
positions.description: Your best asset for advancement.

positions.name: Required Change (Row 1)
positions.description: The necessary internal shift for success.

positions.name: Immediate Challenge (Row 2)
positions.description: The obstacle directly ahead.

positions.name: External Aid (Row 2)
positions.description: Who or what can assist you.

positions.name: Next Step (Row 3)
positions.description: Concrete action to take.

positions.name: Potential (Row 3)
positions.description: The opportunity that awaits.

positions.name: Advice on Timing (Row 3)
positions.description: Guidance on when to move.

positions.name: Short-Term Outcome (Row 4)
positions.description: Result in the next few weeks/months.

positions.name: Long-Term Goal (Row 4)
positions.description: The overall success of your current path.

name: Financial Insight Spread
description: Addresses the mental, physical, and future state of your finances.

positions.name: Mental Wealth
positions.description: Your current mindset about money and abundance.

positions.name: Practical Action
positions.description: The best practical step to improve your finances.

positions.name: Future Financial Flow
positions.description: The flow of money in the near future.

name: Spiritual Growth
description: Examines your current spiritual path and potential for growth.

positions.name: Where Am I Now?
positions.description: Your current spiritual state or belief system.

positions.name: Challenge to Growth
positions.description: What is blocking your spiritual development.

positions.name: Next Step
positions.description: The practice or lesson you need to embrace.

positions.name: Higher Purpose
positions.description: A glimpse of your soul's current purpose.

name: Health & Well-being
description: A holistic spread for physical, emotional, and mental health insight.

positions.name: Physical Body
positions.description: The current state of your physical health.

positions.name: Emotional Health
positions.description: Underlying emotional factors affecting your well-being.

positions.name: Mental Health
positions.description: Your stress levels and mental attitude.

positions.name: What to Release (Bottom)
positions.description: A habit or thought pattern to let go of.

positions.name: Advice for Healing (Top)
positions.description: The best path toward improvement.

name: Quick Clarity Check
description: For when you need immediate, clear advice without overwhelming detail.

positions.name: What You Need to Know
positions.description: The most important piece of information right now.

positions.name: What to Stop Doing
positions.description: An action or habit that is counterproductive.

positions.name: What to Start Doing
positions.description: A new action or mindset to adopt.

positions.name: The Hidden Blessing
positions.description: The unexpected positive outcome of the situation.

name: Moving On Spread
description: A spread to process the end of a relationship and find closure.

positions.name: What Was Learned
positions.description: The main lesson from the relationship.

positions.name: The Pain Point
positions.description: What still hurts or needs to be released.

positions.name: What to Keep
positions.description: The positive memory or growth to hold onto.

positions.name: The Next Step for Self
positions.description: Action to take to rebuild your independence.

positions.name: The Future of Love
positions.description: The energy of your next relationship (after healing).

name: Year Ahead Spread
description: A spread covering the energy and lessons of the next 12 months.

positions.name: Self
positions.description: Your core energy and focus for the year.

positions.name: Relationships
positions.description: Insight into your love and social life.

positions.name: Career
positions.description: The major theme for your work life.

positions.name: Finances
positions.description: Guidance on money matters.

positions.name: Health
positions.description: Focus for physical and mental well-being.

positions.name: Obstacle
positions.description: The main challenge you will face.

positions.name: Support
positions.description: The resource or aid available to you.

positions.name: Lesson
positions.description: The most important spiritual lesson of the year.

positions.name: Overall Theme
positions.description: The overarching energy and outcome of the year.

name: Inner Child Healing
description: Connects to and heals wounds from childhood that still affect the present.

positions.name: The Wounded Child
positions.description: The core wound or need of your inner child.

positions.name: The Mask
positions.description: How you compensate for this wound as an adult.

positions.name: Adult Action
positions.description: What your adult self needs to do for the child.

positions.name: The Nurturing Parent
positions.description: The energy you need to bring to yourself (self-compassion).

positions.name: Integration
positions.description: What healing this brings to your life now.

positions.name: Joyful Future
positions.description: The potential future self once healed.

name: Blockage Removal
description: Identifies the source of a block and how to move past it.

positions.name: Current Blockage (Row 1)
positions.description: What the blockage feels like right now.

positions.name: Conscious Cause (Row 1)
positions.description: The obvious or acknowledged reason for the block.

positions.name: Unconscious Cause (Row 1)
positions.description: The deeper, hidden root of the block.

positions.name: Releasing Action (Row 2)
positions.description: What you need to physically do to release it.

positions.name: Releasing Mindset (Row 2)
positions.description: The belief you need to adopt to release it.

positions.name: The Flow (Row 3)
positions.description: How life will feel once the block is gone.

positions.name: Final Advice (Row 4)
positions.description: The final message from the universe.

name: Meridian Line Spread
description: A spread focused on clarity, inspiration, and grounding for creative or business ventures.

positions.name: The Vision (Top)
positions.description: The ultimate goal or highest vision for the project.

positions.name: The Inspiration
positions.description: The creative energy flowing into the project.

positions.name: The Pivot (Center)
positions.description: The necessary next step or adjustment to the plan.

positions.name: The Practicality
positions.description: The material or financial action needed.

positions.name: The Grounding (Bottom)
positions.description: How to stay grounded and stable through the process.

name: Yes/No Analysis
description: Gives a direct answer (Yes/No) with advice on the underlying energy.

positions.name: The Yes/No Energy
positions.description: The card's main energy often gives the immediate 'Yes' or 'No' sentiment.

positions.name: The Advice
positions.description: Advice on why the answer is what it is, or what you should do next.

positions.name: The Clarifier
positions.description: A card to clarify the overall message or final outcome.
